text: Ezɨ Devit Solomonɨn afeziam, an amebam Urian amuim.1:6 Amizir ziar kagh otiviziba, Israelian amiziba puvatɨ. Me Israelɨn gumazibar iti. Tamar ko Rahap aning Kenanɨn amizimning. Rut, a Moapɨn amizim. Batseba Solomonɨn amebam, a uabɨra Israelɨn amizim. A faragha Urian ike, Uria Hititɨn gumazim.
